Note that particularly dangerous items like fireworks and bombs are likely to tempt the enemy AI to try and detonate them with ranged attacks. While these items are perfectly usable by Mage Hand, in practice it's more reliable to supply the mage hand with less volatile items like potions, water jugs, or poisons so the AI is less likely to interfere.
